reviewText:
awesome material!!!

On April 22-27, 2008, Dr. Geeta S. Iyengar taught a benefit workshop for Ascent magazine at the Yasodhara Ashram in Kootenay Bay, British Columbia, Canada. This series of videos documents this unique learning experience as Dr. Geeta S. Iyengar presents a compressed series of progressive asana and pranayama classes. Questions and answers are also included.

The instructor's English is really hard to understand as her native language is obviously other than English. Way overpriced for what you get to learn/understand from this product. Even if you take the risk and then go for a refund as I did, you will be refund less than half price. Please Amazon I think this could be a great product if you add English subtitles to it. Thanks
The next best thing to being there. the quality of the video and audio is excellent.
